title: Pixel 1 boot loop after a factory reset
content:
Hello,

My pixel 1 has been stuck in a boot loop after a factory reset. After the factory reset, I can set up the phone normally. Then somehow, the phone reset itself and boot loop with Google loading screen.

Sometimes I can load pass the Google booting screen, and go into the home screen for a few seconds then the phone reset itself again and repeating. 

What I noticed is that the battery percent is jumping every time it resets. For example, the phone was at 79%, after it resets itself to 63%, then the phone reset with battery back to 72%, then 76%

I wonder if it is the battery problem or something more serious.

Thank You.
